-- getSaftyList 안전환경보건 리스트 SELECT SFT_ENV_ID AS 'saftyId' /*안전환경보건ID*/ ,TITL_NM AS 'titlNm' /*제목*/ ,SFT_ENV_SCN_CD AS 'sftEnvScnCd' /*구분코드*/ ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('SFT_ENV_SCN_CD', A.SFT_ENV_SCN_CD) AS 'sftEnvScnNm' /*구분이름*/ ,ENFC_DT AS 'enfcDt' /*시행일*/ ,RFRM_SBC AS 'rfrmSbc' /*개정내용*/ ,SBC_NM AS 'sbcNm' /*내용*/ ,RTRV_CNT AS 'rtrvCnt' /*조회수*/ ,KEYWORD_NM AS 'keywordNm' /*키워드*/ ,(CASE WHEN (select count(1) from IRIS_COM_ATTC_FIL where ATTC_FIL_ID = A.ATTC_FILE_ID and DEL_YN = 'N') = 0 THEN NULL ELSE A.ATTC_FILE_ID END) AS 'attcFilId' /*첨부파일*/ ,RGST_ID AS 'rgstId' /*등록자ID*/ ,dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) AS 'rgstNm' /*등록자*/ ,RGST_OPS_ID AS 'rgstOpsId' /*등록자부서ID*/ ,DEL_YN AS 'delYn' /*삭제여부*/ ,convert(varchar(20),A.FRST_RGST_DT,23) AS 'frstRgstDt' /*등록일*/ FROM IRIS_KNLD_SFTY_ENV A WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITL_NM like '%${titlNm}%'
AND dbo.fn_getUserName(RGST_ID) like '%${rgstNm}%'
AND SFT_ENV_SCN_CD = '${sftEnvScnCd}'
AND ENFC_DT >= #{enfcStrtDt}
AND ENFC_DT <= #{enfcFnhDt}
ORDER BY SFT_ENV_ID DESC

WHERE SFT_ENV_ID = #{saftyId}
